title: Tubarões (Ao Vivo)
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Se quer saber de mim, hum, hum
lines.translation: If you want to know about me, hum, hum
lines.grammar: Verbs: quer, saber. Prepositions/case: de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das). Meaning: 'If you want to know about me, hum, hum'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Pergunte para mim
lines.translation: Ask me
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: para (purpose/direction). Meaning: 'Ask me'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Se for falar do que passou
lines.translation: If we're going to talk about what happened in the past
lines.grammar: Verbs: falar, passou. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'If we're going to talk about what happened in the past'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Conta a parte que você errou
lines.translation: Tell me the part you got wrong.

lines.text: Não pergunte se estou bem
lines.translation: Don't ask if I'm okay.
lines.grammar: Verbs: estou. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Don't ask if I'm okay.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Não quero ser assunto seu pra mais ninguém
lines.translation: I don't want to be your topic of conversation with anyone else.
lines.grammar: Verbs: quero, ser, assunto. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'I don't want to be your topic of conversation with anyone else.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Não estrague as minhas canções
lines.translation: Don't ruin my songs.
lines.grammar: Verbs: minhas, canções. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Don't ruin my songs.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Vá pro inferno com suas recordações
lines.translation: Go to hell with your memories.
lines.grammar: Verbs: pro, inferno, suas. Prepositions/case: com (with). Meaning: 'Go to hell with your memories.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Quem me deixou no mar
lines.translation: Who left me at sea?

lines.translation: You have no right to ask me.

lines.text: O que rolou comigo e os tubarões
lines.translation: What happened to me and the sharks?
lines.grammar: Verbs: rolou, comigo, tubarões. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'What happened to me and the sharks?'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Cê não me deve amor, eu não te devo explicações
